thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Banks Expect Oil Prices to Remain High

author: Christopher Alessi
title: Banks Expect Oil Prices to Remain High

organizations.name: organization of the petroleum exporting countries

text:
LONDON—Banks raised their forecasts for oil prices for the seventh month in a row in April on the back of heightened geopolitical risks and OPEC-led production cuts.
The price of Brent crude—the global benchmark—has risen by roughly 50% over the past year, bolstered by the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries’ deal to cut production and tensions in the Middle East that could threaten supply.
